overview: Modest and a music fanatic young man Mihkel finds a time machine by the will of fate. Trying to understand the power of the machine, he also tries to cope with the everyday life of a high school student. Ignorance, confusion and new feelings are also a part of it. With the help of a time machine, the young man tries to impress his sweetheart in different ways, but things are not as simple as they seemed at first. The situation changes even more when dealing with unexpected consequences. During the process, the characters discover within themselves the necessary and unprecedented confidence and courage.
title: Tempus Amore
